Public MustInherit Class PredictedLabelScorerBase Inherits RowToRowScorerBase Implements IDataView
type PredictedLabelScorerBase = class inherit RowToRowScorerBase interface IDataTransform interface IDataView interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: Class for scorers that compute on additional "PredictedLabel" column from the score column. Currently, this scorer is used for binary classification, multi-class classification, and clustering.
